info.title: Ambassador of Russia to Ottawa Stepanov called the arrest of An-124 piracy.
info.short_text: Russia will continue to seek justice and the return of the aircraft.

info.title: Lost from the mobilization of the Ukrainian death in the mountains of Romania
info.short_text: The body of the deceased was found by Romanian border guards.

info.title: “WO”: The mayor of Avdeevka decided to rename the streets of the city
info.short_text: The initiative of officials provoked an outrage among the Ukrainian users of the Network.

info.title: Music. They are sent to death row and they are fired
info.short_text: FSA is firing on its Malaya soldiers who are being sent to the Russians.

info.title: In Ukraine, mass flights of Russian " Kalibrov " and " Gueranai " were reported.
info.short_text: Aerial alarm sounded completely throughout Ukraine.

info.title: In several regions of Ukraine, explosions were reported
info.short_text: Air alerts have been declared throughout the country.

info.title: Aerial alarm was signalled throughout Ukraine
info.short_text: The alarm also appeared in Kiev.

info.title: German Daimler sold his share in Kamaz
info.short_text: Seventy-five per cent of Kamaz shares were in German.

info.title: El País: NATO intends to establish a training centre for UPU fighters
info.short_text: The Centre may be located in Poland.

info.title: In Kansas City, unknowns opened fire during the Super Bowl celebrations
info.short_text: One man was killed.

info.title: Pastor was tempted. Tourchinov is trying to regain power by overthrowing the Greens.
info.short_text: Aif.ru tells me what the former and, uh, the President of Ukraine is doing today 10 years after the war in the country.

info.title: Putin commented on Baden's head attack when he left the helicopter.
info.short_text: The President of the Russian Federation stressed that all people had ever hit their heads.

info.title: He is a dangerous man. Putin shared the impressions of an interview with Carlson.
info.short_text: Vladimir Putin told me what he was talking to an American journalist without cameras.

info.title: Putin: Johnson's mission to Kiev in 2022 was at the expense of the United States.
info.short_text: According to the Russian leader, Johnson could not go to Ukraine without consulting Washington.

info.title: Russian machine gun to stop the attack of the Ukrainian BPLA at the FS position
info.short_text: Thanks to the fighter, the lives of the Russian military were saved and the defence line was strengthened.

info.title: I almost missed it. The BSB was killed by crossing the border of Ukraine with Romania
info.short_text: The Ukrainians fell behind the comrades and died in the mountains.

info.title: Putin stated that he had no right to comment on Bayden's health.
info.short_text: The President of the Russian Federation stressed that he was not a doctor and could not assess anyone ' s health.

info.title: It's over! Trump's statements destroyed NATO.
info.short_text: The costs of European countries have increased, but they remain unsatisfactoryly low, and the United States pays for all.

info.title: Shuravi, excuse me: I'm a fool and a murderer. 35 years ago, we left Afghanistan
info.short_text: AIF spoke to Afghans who remembered 15 February 1989. Even those who fought against the Soviet army, they're very sorry.

info.title: Putin: Today ' s Germans are not responsible for Nazi Germany
info.short_text: The President of the Russian Federation called for a look at the realities of today.
